title: Charming Duplex with Home Office and Pool Access in Swidnica's Historic Center
description: Experience the perfect harmony of modern comfort and old-world charm in this spacious, 174 sqm duplex situated in the heart of Swidnica's Historic Center. Boasting four bright bedrooms, including a master suite with an ensuite bathroom, it's ideal for growing families or remote professionals. Two full bathrooms, a dedicated home office space, and access to a shared swimming pool provide exceptional convenience and luxury. High ceilings, quality finishes, and thoughtful design ensure this home is as functional as it is inviting.
neighborhood_description: Set amid Swidnica's vibrant Historic Center, this neighborhood blends cultural heritage with contemporary living. Explore picturesque streets lined with cafés, museums, and family-oriented amenities, all while enjoying a lively yet welcoming vibe. With reliable public transport and highway access, daily commutes are effortless, and the area's tech-forward atmosphere ensures connectivity for modern living.
lifestyle_benefits: historical ambiance paired with tech-friendly surroundings
target_buyer: Perfect for families or professionals seeking a stable, long-term rental or investment in a culturally rich, community-focused environment with modern ICT infrastructure.
market_positioning: This property stands out as a rare family-size duplex in the heart of Swidnica, offering upscale amenities and historic charm, positioning it as a premium option for renters seeking long-term comfort with a touch of cultural vibrancy.
